definitions.definition: To make suitable; to make to correspond; to fit or suit
To fit by alteration; to modify or remodel for a different purpose; to adjust
definitions.example: to adapt a story for the stage

definitions.definition: To make by altering or fitting something else; to produce by change of form or character
definitions.example: a word of an adapted form

definitions.definition: To make oneself comfortable to a new thing.
definitions.example: They could not adapt to the new climate and so perished.

definitions.definition: Having been subject to an alteration or change to fit a different circumstance or medium.
definitions.example: That movie was an adapted novel.
